description: Migration from InTagsText (V1) to InChips (V2) involves prop renaming (disable → disabledStatus) and updated event handling.

type.transformCode:
// Same prop, but V2 has different values
type="primary"
type.notes: V2 uses semantic types: default, primary, success, warning, danger, info

withIcon.transformCode: // V2 handles icons differently - check documentation

preventXss.transformCode: // Not available in V2 - sanitize text before passing

newFeaturesInV2.description: Visual style variants: solid, soft, outline
Make chip clickable with hover/active states
Visual selection state for toggle behavior
Screen reader label for actionable chips
HTML id attribute for the chip

migrationSteps.title: Update click event
migrationSteps.notes: Use @tag-click for chip body clicks, @click for close button

migrationSteps.title: Remove withIcon if used
migrationSteps.after: // Check V2 documentation for icon handling
migrationSteps.notes: withIcon prop not available in V2

migrationSteps.title: Handle preventXss removal
migrationSteps.after: // Sanitize text before passing to component
migrationSteps.notes: preventXss prop not available in V2

migrationSteps.title: Add styles prop (optional)
migrationSteps.notes: V2 supports solid, soft, outline styles

fullExampleBefore:
<!-- V1 Implementation -->
<template>
  <InTagsText
    type="default"
    text="Category"
    :value="categoryId"
    :disable="isDisabled"
    with-icon
    prevent-xss
    @click="handleTagClick"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { InTagsText } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

export default {
  components: { InTagsText },
  data() {
    return {
      categoryId: 'cat-1',
      isDisabled: false
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleTagClick() {
      console.log('Tag clicked');
    }
  }
};
</script>
fullExampleAfter:
<!-- V2 Implementation -->
<template>
  <InChips
    type="default"
    styles="solid"
    text="Category"
    :value="categoryId"
    :disabled-status="isDisabled"
    interactive
    @tag-click="handleTagClick"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { InChips } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

export default {
  components: { InChips },
  data() {
    return {
      categoryId: 'cat-1',
      isDisabled: false
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleTagClick() {
      console.log('Chip clicked');
    }
  }
};
</script>

commonPitfalls.pitfall: Using @click instead of @tag-click for chip clicks
commonPitfalls.impact: Event not triggered (or only on close button)

commonPitfalls.solution: Check V2 documentation for new icon handling approach

commonPitfalls.pitfall: Not adding interactive prop for clickable chips
commonPitfalls.solution: Add interactive prop for clickable behavior
